name: Custom Login Logo Lite
author: Rafael Poveda - RaveN

sections.description:
This plugin is intended to allow you to change your login logo easily. You just need to upload it to any place
and tell the system where it is.
It differs from other plugins in its options and weight. It is intended to be lite and only change the logo.

Try to adjust your image to 310x51px.

Roadmap

0.3

  • Automatic control of the size of the logo and paddings

0.4

  • Update action=register & action=lostpassword logos

0.5

  • Internacionalization

More Custom Logo Plugins

  • Logo Login by Mark Jaquith. This plugin is based in his.
  • Custom Login by Austin Passy. Very complete one.
  • Custom Login Screen by Billie Kennedy.
sections.installation:
1. Upload custom-login-logo folder to /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. [Optional] Upload your logo image to Media Catalog and copy the URL
  4. Go to Options -> Custom Login Logo
  5. Paste the URL of your custom logo.
sections.changelog:
0.1

  • First Release.

0.2

  • Some changes for 3.3
  • Optimization and change of admin side.
  • Help added
  • Internacionalization

short_description: Install the plugin, tell it where is your logo, and it will be in your login page. Based in Logo Login by Mark Jaquith.
